title: HUGE 2 BR in historical Stadium! The Miller!
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Welcome to The Miller, your new apartment home in Tacoma, Washington!
Vintage charm with modern upgrades makes The Miller a one of a kind place to live.

Located in the Stadium District of Tacoma, these spacious apartment homes for rent are in the best location with views of the Puget Sound and a short walk to coffee shops, restaurants, shopping, amazing schools, and Wright Park.
Experience a new standard of living at The Miller.
Built in 1907, our apartment community has four stories and 31 units.
Choose from our exceptional floor plans, uniquely designed with the apartment amenities you deserve.
Amazing custom wood finishes, charming dining rooms, Butler's pantries, hardwood floors, and well-appointed kitchens make this historic masterpiece a living experience you will never forget.
We have something for everyone at The Miller.
From the moment you arrive, you’ll feel like you have come home.
Our pet-friendly community features beautiful landscaping, a courtyard with barbecue area, and clothes care center.
Our team is dedicated to providing quick and excellent service when you need it.
Schedule a tour today and see what makes The Miller the best apartment community in Tacoma, WA.
$150.00 refundable and $150.00 non-refundable deposit per pet is required.
